trans-unit.resname: 973 3rd St W, North Vancouver, BC V7P 1E4, Canada
trans-unit.source: 973 3rd St W, North Vancouver, BC V7P 1E4, Canada
trans-unit.target: 973 3rd St W, North Vancouver, BC V7P 1E4, Canadá

trans-unit.resname: Avantu was formed in 2020 in Canada to bring the magic of approved scientifically selected bacteria biends to the global market.
trans-unit.source: Avantu was formed in 2020 in Canada to bring the magic of approved scientifically selected bacteria biends to the global market.
trans-unit.target: Avantu se formó en 2020 en Canadá para llevar la magia de las bacterias biológicas aprobadas y seleccionadas científicamente al mercado mundial.

trans-unit.resname: Our roots are in Africa, where our co-founder, Lohmann Beams discovered the power of good bacteria.
trans-unit.source: Our roots are in Africa, where our co-founder, Lohmann Beams discovered the power of good bacteria.
trans-unit.target: Sus raíces están en África, donde su cofundador, Lohmann Beams, descubrió el poder de las bacterias beneficiosas.

trans-unit.resname: Canadian Company Dedicated to Certified Reference Materials.
trans-unit.source: Canadian Company Dedicated to Certified Reference Materials.
trans-unit.target: Empresa Canadiense Dedicada a Materiales de Referencia Certificados.

trans-unit.resname: It is one of the leading providers of quality, ready-to-use reference materials in the mining industry.
trans-unit.source: It is one of the leading providers of quality, ready-to-use reference materials in the mining industry.
trans-unit.target: Es uno de los principales proveedores de materiales de referenia de calidad, listos para usar en la industria minera.

trans-unit.resname: It offers its clients a wide selection of test reference materials as well. such as the preparation of custom standards upon request.
trans-unit.source: It offers its clients a wide selection of test reference materials as well. such as the preparation of custom standards upon request.
trans-unit.target: Ofrece a sus clientes una amplia selección de materiales de referencia de ensayo, así como la preparación de estándares personalizados a pedido.
Sistemas de Digestión Automáticos de Fabricación Canadiense.

trans-unit.resname: Delivers sample digestion technology to prepare samples for analysis faster, with greater precision and improved safety.
trans-unit.source: Delivers sample digestion technology to prepare samples for analysis faster, with greater precision and improved safety.
trans-unit.target: Ofrece tecnología de digestión de muestras para preparar muestras para análisis más rápido, con mayor precisión y seguridad mejorada.

trans-unit.resname: Proven technology is available in multiple platforms that can be incorporated into virtually any standard wet-chem laboratory setting.
trans-unit.source: Proven technology is available in multiple platforms that can be incorporated into virtually any standard wet-chem laboratory setting.
trans-unit.target: La tecnología probada de ColdBlock está disponible en múltiples plataformas que se pueden incorporar en prácticamente cualquier entorno de laboratorio de química húmeda estándar.

trans-unit.resname: Australian Company Producer of Drying, Melting and Cupellation Furnaces.
trans-unit.source: Australian Company Producer of Drying, Melting and Cupellation Furnaces.
trans-unit.target: Empresa Australiana Productora de Hornos de Secado, Fusión y Copelación.

trans-unit.resname: Was established in 2007 with a goal to create a fire assay equipment manufacturing company with an unparalleled focus on quality and customer service.
trans-unit.source: Was established in 2007 with a goal to create a fire assay equipment manufacturing company with an unparalleled focus on quality and customer service.
trans-unit.target: Se estableció en 2007 con el objetivo de crear una empresa de fabricación de equipos de ensayo de fuego con un enfoque incomparable en la calidad y el servicio al cliente.

trans-unit.resname: Furnace and Assay lead the industry with their Technical and Maintenance services.
trans-unit.source: Furnace and Assay lead the industry with their Technical and Maintenance services.
trans-unit.target: Furnace and Assay lidera la industria con sus servicios técnicos y de mantenimiento.

trans-unit.resname: Australian Manufactured Drying, Melting and Cupellation Furnaces.
trans-unit.source: Australian Manufactured Drying, Melting and Cupellation Furnaces.
trans-unit.target: Hornos de Secado, Fusión y Copelación de Fabricación Australiana.

trans-unit.resname: In 1856 the Morgan brothers founded the Patent Plumbago Crucible Company, making crucibles in a small factory in Battersea, London.
trans-unit.source: In 1856 the Morgan brothers founded the Patent Plumbago Crucible Company, making crucibles in a small factory in Battersea, London.
trans-unit.target: En 1856, los hermanos Morgan fundaron la Patent Plumbago Crucible Company, que fabricaba crisoles en una pequeña fábrica en Battersea, Londres.

trans-unit.resname: The company’s success came from their use of graphite (plumbago) in the clay mix to produce a crucible that melted metal faster and lasted longer than anything else available in Europe at the time.
trans-unit.source: The company’s success came from their use of graphite (plumbago) in the clay mix to produce a crucible that melted metal faster and lasted longer than anything else available in Europe at the time.
trans-unit.target: El éxito de la empresa se debió al uso de grafito (plumbago) en la mezcla de arcilla para producir un crisol que fundía el metal más rápido y duraba más que cualquier otra cosa disponible en Europa en ese momento.

trans-unit.resname: It is a Canadian international manufacturer and distributor of all types of thermoplastic piping systems.(HDPE, PP, PVC, CPVC ECT.) for industrial and municipal projects.
trans-unit.source: It is a Canadian international manufacturer and distributor of all types of thermoplastic piping systems.(HDPE, PP, PVC, CPVC ECT.) for industrial and municipal projects.
trans-unit.target: Es un fabricados internacional canadiense y distribuidor de todo tipo de sistemas de tuberís termoplásticas (HDPE, PP, PVC, CPVC ECT.) para proyectos industriales y municipales.

trans-unit.resname: PPSI It also has field bonding services for all of our products.
trans-unit.source: PPSI It also has field bonding services for all of our products.
trans-unit.target: PPSI también tiene servicios de unión de campo para todos nuestros productos.

trans-unit.resname: Products Designed and Manufactured in New Zealand
trans-unit.source: Products Designed and Manufactured in New Zealand
trans-unit.target: Productos Diseñados y Fabricados en Nueva Zelanda

trans-unit.resname: Rocklabs is a recognized brand, under the Scott Technologies seal; offer robotic and intelligent automation solutions. Was established in 1969 as a commercial laboratory, specialising in geochemical analysis and fire assaying.
trans-unit.source: Rocklabs is a recognized brand, under the Scott Technologies seal; offer robotic and intelligent automation solutions. Was established in 1969 as a commercial laboratory, specialising in geochemical analysis and fire assaying.
trans-unit.target: Rocklabs es una marca reconocida, bajo el sello de Scott Technologies; ofrecen soluciones robóticas y de automatización inteligente. Se estableció en 1969 como un laboratorio comercial, especializado en análisis geoquímico y ensayos de fuego.

trans-unit.resname: Since then, Rocklabs has been a global innovator in the sample preparation equipment field, supplying a wide variety of equipment for the mining of gold, silver, platinum, iron and palladium.
trans-unit.source: Since then, Rocklabs has been a global innovator in the sample preparation equipment field, supplying a wide variety of equipment for the mining of gold, silver, platinum, iron and palladium.
trans-unit.target: Desde entonces, Rocklabs ha sido un innovador global en el campo de los equipos ded preparación de muestras, una amplia variedad de equipos para la extracción de oro, plata, platino, hierro y paladio.

trans-unit.resname: We pride ourselves on building strong partnerships in the mining sector that lead to lasting relationships with our clients. We do this by providing tailor made services to our globally based clients.
trans-unit.source: We pride ourselves on building strong partnerships in the mining sector that lead to lasting relationships with our clients. We do this by providing tailor made services to our globally based clients.
trans-unit.target: La satisfacción del cliente es el núcleo de la filosofía de STG Mining y nuestro experimentado personal internacional se esfuerza por hacer su vida un poco más fácil simplificando las necesidades de su laboratorio.

trans-unit.resname: As a small business with a global presence, our customers are what really matter.
trans-unit.source: As a small business with a global presence, our customers are what really matter.
trans-unit.target: Como una pequeña empresa con presencia global, nuestros clientes son lo que realmente importa.

trans-unit.resname: To provide honest and reliable service combined with best-in-class products to meet our clients’ specific needs. We are here for you.
trans-unit.source: To provide honest and reliable service combined with best-in-class products to meet our clients’ specific needs. We are here for you.
trans-unit.target: Nos esforzamos por brindar continuamente un servicio honesto y confiable, combinado con los mejores productos para satisfacer las necesidades específicas de nuestros clientes. Estamos aquí para usted y valoramos su colaboración y asociación. Su éxito, es nuestro éxito.

trans-unit.resname: Achieve a relationship with our clients as partners that will bring added value to them and our shareholders.
trans-unit.source: Achieve a relationship with our clients as partners that will bring added value to them and our shareholders.
trans-unit.target: Nuestra visión, es convertirnos en un proveedor de confianza de equipos de minería de laboratorios en toda América.
Como Especialistas en Laboratorios de Minería.

trans-unit.resname: We provide products and services that fit your unique needs.
trans-unit.source: We provide products and services that fit your unique needs.
trans-unit.target: Brindamos Productos y Servicios que se adaptan a sus necesidades.

trans-unit.resname: We are dedicated to providing quality products and excellent client services.
trans-unit.source: We are dedicated to providing quality products and excellent client services.
trans-unit.target: Nos dedicamos a brindar productos de calidad y un excelente servicio al cliente.

trans-unit.resname: Over the years, we have partnered with leaders in the mining industry.
trans-unit.source: Over the years, we have partnered with leaders in the mining industry.
trans-unit.target: Con el paso de los años, nos hemos relacionado con líderes de la industría minera.

trans-unit.resname: High-performance crucibles and foundry consumables for non-ferrous metal melting applications.
trans-unit.source: High-performance crucibles and foundry consumables for non-ferrous metal melting applications.
trans-unit.target: Crisoles de alto rendimiento y consumibles de fundición para aplicaciones de fusión de metales no ferrosos.

trans-unit.resname: They are manufactured from very pure kaolin, enriched with Alumina in versions with higher classification temperatures.
trans-unit.source: They are manufactured from very pure kaolin, enriched with Alumina in versions with higher classification temperatures.
trans-unit.target: Son fabricados a partir de caolines muy puros,enriquecidos con alúmina en las versiones cuyas temperaturasde clasificación son más elevadas.

trans-unit.resname: Made in ceramic materials, in black and white, volumes from single to high performance, sizes to be tailored to your requirements and used in applications in the chemical processing markets, industrial, aerospace, energy, medical, etc.
trans-unit.source: Made in ceramic materials, in black and white, volumes from single to high performance, sizes to be tailored to your requirements and used in applications in the chemical processing markets, industrial, aerospace, energy, medical, etc.
trans-unit.target: Hecho en materiales de cerámica, en blanco y negro, volúmenes desde únicos hasta de alto rendimiento, tamaños que se adaptan a sus requisitos y se utilizan en aplicaciones en los mercados de procesamiento químico, industrial, aeroespacial, energético, médico, etc.

trans-unit.resname: The 100 Place Cupellation is suitable for large laboratories, processing 400 to 1200 samples per day. Works with natural gas, liquefied petroleum gas (L.P.) and Diesel.
trans-unit.source: The 100 Place Cupellation is suitable for large laboratories, processing 400 to 1200 samples per day. Works with natural gas, liquefied petroleum gas (L.P.) and Diesel.
trans-unit.target: El 100 Place Cupellation es adecuado para laboratorios grandes, con procesamientos de entre 400 a 1200 muestras por dí. Trabaja con gas natural, gas licuado de petroleo (L.P.) y Diesel.

trans-unit.resname: This oven has an easy-to-use rotary main on / off switch. It is heated by 12 elements mounted on the side walls. It is ideal for continuous operation. as this will prolong the life of the elements.
trans-unit.source: This oven has an easy-to-use rotary main on / off switch. It is heated by 12 elements mounted on the side walls. It is ideal for continuous operation. as this will prolong the life of the elements.
trans-unit.target: Este horno tiene un interruptor principal giratorio de encendido/apagado fácil de usar. Se calienta mediante 12 elementos montados en las paredes laterales. Es ideal para el funcionamiento continuo. ya que esto prolongará la vida de los elementos.

trans-unit.resname: This oven has a double-burner system forced by a fan, with a system of automatic ignition. It can be switched between NG and LPG (propane) to suit different site requirements, with just a few simple adjustments made on site that involve minimal downtime and associated costs.
trans-unit.source: This oven has a double-burner system forced by a fan, with a system of automatic ignition. It can be switched between NG and LPG (propane) to suit different site requirements, with just a few simple adjustments made on site that involve minimal downtime and associated costs.
trans-unit.target: Este horno tiene un sistema de doble quemador forzado por ventilador, con sistema de encendido automático. Se puede cambiar entre GN y GLP (propano) para adaptarse a los diferentes requisitos del sitio, con solo unos pocos ajustes simples realizados en el sitio que implican un mínimo de tiempo de inactividad y costos asociados.

trans-unit.resname: High-density polyethylene (HDPE) tubing from 1/2 ″ diameter to 144 ″ diameter.
trans-unit.source: High-density polyethylene (HDPE) tubing from 1/2 ″ diameter to 144 ″ diameter.
trans-unit.target: Tubería de polietileno de alta densidad (HDPE) de 1/2 ″ de diámetro a 144 ″ de diámetro.

trans-unit.resname: Polypropylene compression fittings and service mounts in a variety of sizes.
trans-unit.source: Polypropylene compression fittings and service mounts in a variety of sizes.
trans-unit.target: Accesorios de compresión de polipropileno y monturas de servicio en una variedad de tamaños.

trans-unit.resname: The ROCKLABS BOYD Elite is the world’s first double-acting fine jaw crusher, employing jaws that can hold up to 5kg of sample and crush a 70mm sample to 2mm in a single pass.
trans-unit.source: The ROCKLABS BOYD Elite is the world’s first double-acting fine jaw crusher, employing jaws that can hold up to 5kg of sample and crush a 70mm sample to 2mm in a single pass.
trans-unit.target: El ROCKLABS BOYD Elite es el primer triturador de mandíbula fina de doble acción del mundo, que emplea mandíbulas que pueden contener hasta 5 kg de muestra y triturar una muestra de 70 mm a 2 mm en una sola pasada.

trans-unit.resname: Rocklabs larger-model BOYD Crusher – the BIG BOYD Crusher - employs double-acting fine jaw crushers to process samples of up to 20kg.
trans-unit.source: Rocklabs larger-model BOYD Crusher – the BIG BOYD Crusher - employs double-acting fine jaw crushers to process samples of up to 20kg.
trans-unit.target: La trituradora BOYD de modelo más grande de Rocklabs, la trituradora BIG BOYD, emplea trituradoras de mandíbula fina de doble acción para procesar muestras de hasta 20 kg.

trans-unit.resname: The Rocklabs Smart BOYD LSD combo combines the BOYD Crusher with a Linear Sample Divider (LSD) controlled by a Programmable Logic System (PLC) allowing an operator to pre-weigh samples and select the suitable split weights. It is capable of variable splits in one pass.
trans-unit.source: The Rocklabs Smart BOYD LSD combo combines the BOYD Crusher with a Linear Sample Divider (LSD) controlled by a Programmable Logic System (PLC) allowing an operator to pre-weigh samples and select the suitable split weights. It is capable of variable splits in one pass.
trans-unit.target: El combo Rocklabs Smart BOYD LSD combina la trituradora BOYD con un divisor lineal de muestras (LSD) controlado por un sistema lógico programable (PLC) que permite al operador pesar previamente las muestras y seleccionar los pesos divididos adecuados.

trans-unit.resname: The Rocklabs Mid-Boyd utilises our double acting fine jaw crushing design, with an increased sample input size of up to 100mm. Featuring top and bottom moving jaws, the MID BOYD delivers the maximum amount of crushing, reducing samples by 50 times the original size.
trans-unit.source: The Rocklabs Mid-Boyd utilises our double acting fine jaw crushing design, with an increased sample input size of up to 100mm. Featuring top and bottom moving jaws, the MID BOYD delivers the maximum amount of crushing, reducing samples by 50 times the original size.
trans-unit.target: El Rocklabs Mid-Boyd utiliza nuestro diseño de trituración de mandíbula fina de doble acción, con un tamaño de entrada de muestra aumentado de hasta 100 mm. Con mordazas móviles superior e inferior, MID BOYD ofrece la máxima cantidad de trituración, reduciendo las muestras en 50 veces el tamaño original.

trans-unit.resname: The Rocklabs Hydraulic Crusher trims excess material from rock samples and drills cores prior to pulverising.
trans-unit.source: The Rocklabs Hydraulic Crusher trims excess material from rock samples and drills cores prior to pulverising.
trans-unit.target: La trituradora hidráulica Rocklabs prepara muestras de trazas de metales antes de pulverizarlas en un molino de anillo ROCKLABS o equipo similar. Está diseñado para ser fácil de usar, simple de mantener y rentable de operar.

trans-unit.resname: The design simplicity makes the Rocklabs Hammer Mill suitable for processing a wide variety of materials. It is particularly designed to process samples with high moisture content or those that tend to form lumps such as coal, limestone, laterite, saprolite, bauxite, and gypsum but can process all other rock types.
trans-unit.source: The design simplicity makes the Rocklabs Hammer Mill suitable for processing a wide variety of materials. It is particularly designed to process samples with high moisture content or those that tend to form lumps such as coal, limestone, laterite, saprolite, bauxite, and gypsum but can process all other rock types.
trans-unit.target: Está especialmente diseñado para procesar muestras con alto contenido de humedad o aquellas que tienden a formar grumos como carbón, piedra caliza, laterita, saprolita, bauxita y yeso, pero puede procesar todos los demás tipos de rocas.

trans-unit.resname: The CB15S can safely operate in any standard wet-chem laboratory fume hood or comparable ventilation system.
trans-unit.source: The CB15S can safely operate in any standard wet-chem laboratory fume hood or comparable ventilation system.
trans-unit.target: El CB15S puede funcionar de forma segura en cualquier campana de extracción de laboratorio de química húmeda estándar o en un sistema de ventilación comparable.

trans-unit.resname: The CB12L digester is ideal for preparation of larger sample sizes up to 30 g. The CB12L can safely operate in any standard wet-chem laboratory fume hood or comparable ventilation system.
trans-unit.source: The CB12L digester is ideal for preparation of larger sample sizes up to 30 g. The CB12L can safely operate in any standard wet-chem laboratory fume hood or comparable ventilation system.
trans-unit.target: El digestor CB12L es ideal para la preparación de muestras más grandes de hasta 30 gr. El CB12L puede funcionar de forma segura en cualquier campana de extracción de laboratorio de química húmeda estándar o en un sistema de ventilación comparable.

trans-unit.resname: We work closely with you to maintain your equipment in a state of optimal functioning.
trans-unit.source: We work closely with you to maintain your equipment in a state of optimal functioning.
trans-unit.target: Trabajamos estrechamente con usted para mantener su equipo en un estado de funcionamiento óptimo.

trans-unit.resname: We provide onsite inspections, testing, replacement, re-installations, calibrations, repairs and reconstruction as needed.
trans-unit.source: We provide onsite inspections, testing, replacement, re-installations, calibrations, repairs and reconstruction as needed.
trans-unit.target: Proporcionamos inspecciones, pruebas, reemplazos, reinstalaciones, calibraciones, reparaciones y reconstrucciones según sea necesario.

trans-unit.resname: We help you optimize and improve the performance of your technological products or services, such as hardware and software, with a problem-prevention approach.
trans-unit.source: We help you optimize and improve the performance of your technological products or services, such as hardware and software, with a problem-prevention approach.
trans-unit.target: Te ayudamos a optimizar y mejorar el rendimiento de tus productos o servicios tecnológicos, como hardware y software, con un enfoque de prevención de problemas.

trans-unit.resname: We seek to provide you with the best guidance on the use of systems, and corrections for equipment malfunctions.
trans-unit.source: We seek to provide you with the best guidance on the use of systems, and corrections for equipment malfunctions.
trans-unit.target: Buscamos brindarle la mejor orientación sobre el uso de los sistemas y las correcciones para el mal funcionamiento de los equipos.

trans-unit.resname: One of the great benefits of wastewater treatment is to produce largely clean, reusable water that is conveniently available for reuse.
trans-unit.source: One of the great benefits of wastewater treatment is to produce largely clean, reusable water that is conveniently available for reuse.
trans-unit.target: Uno de los grandes beneficios del tratamiento de aguas residuales es el de producir en gran medida agua limpia reutilizable y que esté convenientemente disponible para el rehúso.

trans-unit.resname: This type of treatment is also known as wastewater purification.
trans-unit.source: This type of treatment is also known as wastewater purification.
trans-unit.target: Este tipo de tratamiento también es conocido como depuración de las aguas residuales.
Especialistas en Tratamientos de Agua Residuales

trans-unit.resname: Accelerates the biodegradation of effluent from the processes of the pig industry (slurry) and quickly removes ammonia, responsible for harmful odors.
trans-unit.source: Accelerates the biodegradation of effluent from the processes of the pig industry (slurry) and quickly removes ammonia, responsible for harmful odors.
trans-unit.target: Acelera la biodegradación del efluente de los procesos de la industria del cerdo (purines) y elimina rápidamente el amoníaco, responsable de los olores nocivos.

trans-unit.resname: Slow release gel that biodegrades organic and faecal waste into all water treatment systems.
trans-unit.source: Slow release gel that biodegrades organic and faecal waste into all water treatment systems.
trans-unit.target: Gel de liberación lenta que biodegrada los residuos orgánicos y fecales en todos los sistemas de tratamiento de aguas.

trans-unit.resname: Biomass secretes mainly fat through the main enzyme to biodegrade fats and oils, lipase.
trans-unit.source: Biomass secretes mainly fat through the main enzyme to biodegrade fats and oils, lipase.
trans-unit.target: La biomasa segrega principalmente grasa mediante la principal enzima para biodegradar grasas y aceites, la lipasa.

trans-unit.resname: A powerful broad-spectrum biocatalyst that significantly accelerates the rate of natural biological degradation of fats, oils and organic waste up to 1000 times.
trans-unit.source: A powerful broad-spectrum biocatalyst that significantly accelerates the rate of natural biological degradation of fats, oils and organic waste up to 1000 times.
trans-unit.target: Un potente biocatalizador de amplio espectro que acelera significativamente la tasa de degradación biológica natural de grasas, aceites y desechos orgánicos hasta 1000 veces.

trans-unit.resname: Biodegrades hydrocarbon oil in water, floors, carpets, brick pavements and it is eco-friendly with the environment for flora, fauna, aquatic life and animals.
trans-unit.source: Biodegrades hydrocarbon oil in water, floors, carpets, brick pavements and it is eco-friendly with the environment for flora, fauna, aquatic life and animals.
trans-unit.target: Biodegrada el aceite de hidrocarburos en el agua, suelos, alfombras, pavimentos de ladrillos y es eco-amigable con el medio ambiente para para la flora, la fauna, la vida acuática y los animales.
